pizzerias.name: Trattoria Buongiorno
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Hawaii (sos de roșii, mozzarella, șuncă, ananas proaspăt, oregano)
pizzerias.description: Popular Italian restaurant chain with multiple locations in Bucharest. Their Hawaiian pizza features fresh pineapple and quality ham on a thin, crispy crust.

pizzerias.name: Tutti Pizza
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Tropicana (sos de roșii, mozzarella, șuncă, ananas, oregano)
pizzerias.description: Local pizzeria known for affordable prices and quick delivery. Their Hawaiian-style Tropicana pizza is among their most popular offerings.

pizzerias.name: Mamizza
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaii Special (sos de roșii, mozzarella, șuncă porchetta, ananas caramelizat, jalapeño)
pizzerias.description: Artisanal pizzeria using a traditional wood-fired oven. Their Hawaiian pizza gets an upgrade with porchetta ham, caramelized pineapple, and jalapeños for a spicy kick.

pizzerias.name: La Placinte
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Moldovenească de Ananas (sos de roșii, brânză de burduf, șuncă, ananas, porumb)
pizzerias.description: Restaurant chain specializing in Moldovan cuisine that also offers pizzas. Their unique Hawaiian pizza uses traditional Romanian sheep cheese (burduf) and adds corn as an extra topping.

pizzerias.name: Pizza Hut
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaiian Pizza (sos de roșii, mozzarella, șuncă, ananas)
pizzerias.description: Global pizza chain with multiple locations throughout Bucharest. Their classic Hawaiian pizza is available in pan, thin, or stuffed crust variations.

pizzerias.name: Vivo Fusion Food Bar
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Tropicală Fusion (sos de roșii, mozzarella, șuncă de curcan, ananas, mango, ardei iute)
pizzerias.description: Fusion restaurant offering creative takes on international favorites. Their tropical pizza features turkey ham, pineapple, mango, and chili for a fusion take on the Hawaiian classic.

pizzerias.name: Pizzeria Colosseum
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Hawai (sos de roșii, mozzarella, șuncă prosciutto cotto, ananas, oregano)
pizzerias.description: Traditional Roman-style pizzeria using imported Italian ingredients. Their Hawaiian pizza features premium Italian cooked ham (prosciutto cotto) for an elevated flavor profile.

pizzerias.name: Dristor Kebap & Pizza
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Hawaii Orientală (sos de roșii, mozzarella, șuncă, ananas, susan, oregano)
pizzerias.description: Popular fast-food chain known primarily for kebabs but also offering good value pizzas. Their Hawaiian pizza includes a unique addition of sesame seeds for an Oriental twist.

pizzerias.name: Animaletto Pizza Bar
pizzerias.specialty: Maui Wowie (sos de roșii, mozzarella di bufala, prosciutto cotto, ananas grătar, ardei iute, busuioc)
pizzerias.description: Hip, modern pizzeria and cocktail bar in Bucharest's Old Town. Their premium Hawaiian pizza features buffalo mozzarella and grilled pineapple for enhanced flavor complexity.

pizzerias.name: Jerry's Pizza
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaii Pizza (sos de roșii, mozzarella, șuncă, ananas)
pizzerias.description: Romanian pizza delivery chain with multiple locations throughout Bucharest. Their classic Hawaiian pizza is available in various sizes and crust options.
